meta.bias_notes: Tight left-handed All-Weather track. Low draws favored in sprints (5f-7f). Front-runners and handy types have an advantage due to the short straight and kickback.

selections.name: Homme De Fer
selections.reason: In peak form cycle (3-1-4 last 3). Shows the tactical speed required to overcome the wider draw. Consistent speed figures suggest he fits this class perfectly.

selections.name: How's The Guvnor
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with a 2nd and 3rd in recent starts. Late pace figures are solid, but the wide barrier (9) requires a clean trip.

selections.name: Fistral Beach
selections.reason: Draws well in barrier 3. Recent 4th was a decent effort and drops into a favorable spot to stalk the pace.

danger_horse.name: Mythical Isle
danger_horse.reason: Finished 2nd last time out, showing a return to form. Dangerous if allowed to dictate or sit close.

selections.name: Bandello
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd place finish. Consistent pace figures and fits the 'stalker' profile that works well here.

selections.name: Bad Habits
selections.reason: Excellent rail draw (1). Won three starts back and should get a ground-saving trip to challenge late.

selections.name: River Wharfe
selections.reason: Won recently at this track (Jan 11). Proven affinity for the surface and draws well in 3.

danger_horse.name: Court Of Session
danger_horse.reason: Class dropper with back class. If he wakes up, he has the figures to contend.

selections.name: Horwich
selections.reason: Won debut impressively. The clear class of the field with the best speed figure on the card. Likely lone speed or presser.

selections.name: Kokushoku
selections.reason: Crisford stable debutant. Market support (9-5) suggests he is working well and ready to fire first time out.

selections.name: Quick Quasar
selections.reason: Experience edge over others. Draws well (2) to save ground.

danger_horse.name: Lucky Sevens
danger_horse.reason: Showed little on debut but natural improvement expected.

selections.name: Midnight Call
selections.reason: In superb form (1-3-1). Won last start at this track/distance. Draws barrier 3 which is ideal for this sprint.

selections.name: Sultan Of Oj
selections.reason: Consistent recent form (3rd, 2nd). Has the early speed to overcome the wide draw if aggressive.

selections.name: The Defiant
selections.reason: Veteran with back class. 2nd two starts back suggests he still has the fire.

danger_horse.name: Juno Star
danger_horse.reason: Capable on his day, 5th last time but not beaten far.

selections.name: Himself
selections.reason: Won last time out. Improving profile and stays this trip well. The one to beat.

selections.name: Prince Quattro
selections.reason: Winner recently. Consistent stayer who will be grinding it out at the finish.

selections.name: Billy Bathgate
selections.reason: Solid 4th last time. Draws well (3) to get a covered trip and save energy for the long stretch.

danger_horse.name: Chicago Storm
danger_horse.reason: Hurdler switching back to flat. Stamina is guaranteed.

selections.name: Calabrian Soldato
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last time out. improving type who fits this class level well.

selections.name: Oh So Perfect
selections.reason: 3rd last time. Draws well in 3. Should be right in the mix with natural improvement.

selections.name: Warrior Queen
selections.reason: 3rd recently. Has shown enough speed to be competitive here.

danger_horse.name: He Bangs The Drums
danger_horse.reason: Wide draw (9) is a concern, but has some ability if he can cross over.

selections.name: Pink Socks
selections.reason: On an absolute tear with 3 wins in the last 17 days (1-1-1). Form cycle is peaking. Draws perfectly in 3.

selections.name: Rajinoora
selections.reason: Class drop/lateral move. 4th last time but competitive figures.

selections.name: Leeson Street
selections.reason: Rail draw (1) is a huge advantage. 4th last time, can improve with the ground-saving trip.

danger_horse.name: Rose Cotton
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced, could improve, but facing a very hot favorite.

selections.name: Rogue De Vega
selections.reason: Won last two starts (Double Top pattern). Rail draw (1) on a 5f sprint at Wolves is a massive advantage.

selections.name: Son Of Astar
selections.reason: 3rd last time. Draws next to the favorite in barrier 2. Should follow the rail runner.

selections.name: Some Nightmare
selections.reason: 3rd recently. Consistent sort who picks up pieces if the leaders duel.

danger_horse.name: Alafdhal
danger_horse.reason: Has back class and speed, but needs to clear traffic.

selections.name: Street Life
selections.reason: The rail horse (Barrier 1). 3rd last time, consistent speed figures. Best value to hold the rail and kick.

selections.name: Forest Gunner
selections.reason: Won last time out. In good form, but gives up the rail advantage to Street Life.

selections.name: Shalaa Asker
selections.reason: 3rd recently. Draws well (2) to stalk the leaders.

danger_horse.name: Sir Benedict
danger_horse.reason: Capable of popping up at a price, but draw is tricky.
